Text: FREE PALESTINE???  Which PALESTINE? let us FREE PALESTINE from the occupying Arabs who have destroyed the land of milk and honey. Until 1948 Palestinians were Jews the others in the country were Arabs,  Arabs are from Arabia, Jews have had a +3000 year history in the country. the Arabs have 22 Arab Islamic republics. Israel took in 800.000 Jews who these 22 countries expelled just because they were Jews and not Muslims, well they can take in the Arabs in exchange instead they put them in concentration camps to be used as political pawns.  PALESTINE? PALESTINE is the Roman word for Judea, The land of the Jews, NOT THE ARABS..

dear malabu99 , I think this is not the place to spread your zionist lobbytalk.You of all people should watch this movie. I also think that you are confusing the bible with a historybook.
